column1: Little Goat Diner////When I came here for breakfast on Saturday
column2: I had to wait about an hour to be seated. There was a similar wait when I came for lunch if I had wanted to get a table or booth seat. However
column3: I skipped the wait by opting to sit at the bar. However
column4: this isn't really possible if you come with more than one or two friends as usually there isn't enough space.
